ch0150_00_hayato/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you
enjoying the nice breeze we’re getting today?
ch0150_00_hayato/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll ride these winds with my partner Pokémon!
Don’t you go falling behind!
ch0150_00_hayato/7101_0701_01_10:
When I battle challengers at my Gym, I use my
father’s cherished bird Pokémon!
ch0150_00_hayato/7101_0701_02_10:
I get the feeling he’s looking over me when I
battle with his Pokémon, and I want to do
him proud!
ch0150_00_hayato/7101_0701_03_10:
I won’t lose to anyone here on Pasio. Watch me
fly higher than even you!
ch0150_00_hayato/7102_0701_01_10: Have you ever tried flying with your Pokémon?
ch0150_00_hayato/7102_0701_02_10:
I hear in another region far from mine, they use
Corviknight as a way to get around.
ch0150_00_hayato/7102_0701_03_10:
Is it better to take on the gales headfirst on your
Pokémon’s back? Or is it better to be gently
rocked as you’re carried to your destination?
ch0150_00_hayato/7103_0701_01_10:
Do you have anyone you respect and want to
be like?
ch0150_00_hayato/7103_0701_02_10:
For me, it’s my father. He’s a Pokémon Trainer
respected by everyone he meets!
ch0150_00_hayato/7103_0701_03_10:
Janine from Fuchsia City says her father, Koga, is
number one...
ch0150_00_hayato/7103_0701_04_10:
But he’s obviously number two, because number
one is MY father!
ch0150_00_hayato/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s a natural threat to my bird Pokémon! Let’s see
if my strategies against Electric-type attacks work
on you!
ch0150_00_hayato/7105_0701_01_10:
What are your goals here on Pasio,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0150_00_hayato/7105_0701_02_10:
Mine is to be like my father... But he’s not here
on Pasio.
ch0150_00_hayato/7105_0701_03_10:
Either way, I’m going to train here with my
Pokémon so I can be just like him!
ch0150_00_hayato/1701_0701_01_10: What perfect timing! I have something for you!
ch0150_00_hayato/1701_0702_01_10: Let it be the wind beneath your wings.
ch0150_00_hayato/2501_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Oh, hey there... My Swellow is an
early riser.
ch0150_00_hayato/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why bird Pokémon are great for people
who want a structured lifestyle!
ch0150_00_hayato/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m still sleepy, though. I wonder if Swellow will
let me use its feathers as a pillow...
ch0150_00_hayato/2501_0702_01_10:
I bet it’d be really nice to fall asleep with
an Altaria.
ch0150_00_hayato/2501_0702_02_10:
Their soft, fluffy bodies are just like clouds, and
they sing so nicely, I’m sure I’d go right to sleep!
ch0150_00_hayato/2511_0701_01_10:
Lots of rookie Trainers start off by catching
bird Pokémon.
ch0150_00_hayato/2511_0701_02_10:
Even Blue made it to the Hall of Fame with his
Pidgeot. He met it as a Pidgey, you know.
ch0150_00_hayato/2511_0701_03_10: I wonder if I could become the Champion, too.
ch0150_00_hayato/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ll rise together with my Pokémon all the way to
the top!
ch0150_00_hayato/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m going to be the number-one bird Pokémon
Trainer ever, together with my Swellow!
ch0150_00_hayato/3001_0701_01_10:
Bird Pokémon are early risers. When you spend
as much time around them as I do, you tend to
become an early bird yourself!
ch0150_00_hayato/3003_0701_01_10:
It looks like the wind’s blowing hard out there
today! Perfect conditions for training bird Pokémon!
ch0150_00_hayato/3005_0701_01_10:
It sure is quiet. If we were in Johto, the Hoothoot
would be hooting up a storm at this hour!
